Articles.Content: I was just wondering if the M 27 Overview command pod was still available. I can't seem to find the thing on Spaceport and I'd really like to download it again. Is it out of date now?

The part is part of the B9 aerospace pack, which can be found for download here.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25241-0-22-B9-Aerospace-Pack-R4-0c-New-pods-IVAs-engines-fuselages-structures

Some of the parts, like control surfaces and SABREs need certain tweaks to work correctly. Look around and you'll find them here on the forums.
